entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
